ComicInfo.Summary:
Mayhem on Mystery Mile!: The Mystery Incorporated team tests the security in their headquarters, then muses on the origins of their super-powers. But things get dangerous when a mysterious intruder causes those defenses to turn against the team. When Kid Dynamo is captured, the team must pursue the intruder into...the Maybe Machine!
Shamed By You English?: Back cover phony ad for courses in speaking better English.
ComicInfo.Tags: New York State,Kid Dynamo,Mystery Incorporated,Shaft,Crystal Man,Mystery Mile,Neon Queen,The Fury,Planet
ComicInfo.Title: Mayhem on Mystery Mile!; Shamed By You English?
